entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
